heading: Collaborative law
lede: Collaborative lawyers work with you and the other parent to resolve your issues out of court. You each hire a lawyer then all meet to negotiate face-to-face.
lede_additional: The collaborative process involves several steps but is usually quicker and cheaper than going to court.
pros: everyone is committed to not going to court
quicker and less stressful than court
you and the other parent set the agenda
good for your children to see their parents working together
usp: You can still communicate with the other parent but may have complex legal issues to resolve.
